Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe will have to bat exceptionally well against a formidable Indian bowling attack, to push for another win in the series.
Thatâ€™s why, the third T20I is definitely for the taking as far as Team India are concerned, if they play anywhere close to their best level against Zimbabwe.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian cricket team bounced back strongly from an early setback in the first T20I, ensuring that they level the series at 1-1.
The batting lineup of Zimbabwe has been a big let down in the first two T20I matches of the series except for Brian Bennett, who struck a few lusty blows against the Indian pacers.
The Indian batting lineup put up a massive score in the second T20I with a maiden international hundred for Abhishek Sharma after he and team had a horrible outing in the first match.
In the bowling side of things, India were quite good in both the matches of the series, restricting Zimbabwe for 115/9 in the first one before bundling them out for 134 in the second one.
